revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.1)
revision.text: {{AfricaProject|class=start}} {{WPMILHIST|class=Start | |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=no |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |African-task-force=yes|National-task-force=yes}} ==Numbers== What are these numbers supposed to mean? * Panhard AML-90 90mm 4x4 ARVs-31 + 10 31 in service plus 10 retired? 31 bought initially then 10 bought later? Or something completely different? It's not clear to readers; if anybody know what it's supposed to mean, spell it out. If not, delete it. [[User:Bobrayner|bobrayner]] ([[User talk:Bobrayner|talk]]) 21:19, 19 August 2011 (UTC) ==Vandalism== Someone has been adding random vehicles to this section. Last time I checked, Cameroon didn't have Abrams, Leclerc, Leopard, or any other modern MBT. I have reverted the page to the last correct version. --[[User:DraconianDebate|DraconianDebate]] ([[User talk:DraconianDebate|talk]]) 04:30, 9 September 2011 (UTC) == Continued False and misleading information in this article == Cameroon never had or will have Heavy MBTs in their forces, No Abrams, Leopard 2, M84. nor do they have the numbers of Missle/Artillery/APC/Vehicle systems stated in previous edits, they dont have enough forces to operate them. I have corrected what i know to be accurate. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Lima25218|Lima25218]] ([[User talk:Lima25218|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Lima25218|contribs]]) 19:58, 14 November 2011 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Cameroonian Armed Forces]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=738894460 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20150209022905/http://www.diplomatie.gouv.fr/fr/actions-france_830/defense-securite_9035/cooperation-securite-defense_9037/revue-freres-armes_12582/freres-armes-258-dossier-cameroun_18857/dossier_19041/armee-terre_64741.html to http://www.diplomatie.gouv.fr/fr/actions-france_830/defense-securite_9035/cooperation-securite-defense_9037/revue-freres-armes_12582/freres-armes-258-dossier-cameroun_18857/dossier_19041/armee-terre_64741.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 17:33, 11 September 2016 (UTC)
